abramacabra.name: STATUS_ABRAMACABRA_NAME
abramacabra.description_localised: Walls absorb a certain number of incoming hits. Type-advantaged attacks immediately break walls. In addition to standard Wall behavior, Abramacabra automatically attacks one opponent each turn.

ap_boost.name: STATUS_AP_BOOST_NAME
ap_boost.description_localised: Characters with AP Boost gain 1 extra AP each round.

ap_drain.name: STATUS_AP_DRAIN_NAME
ap_drain.description_localised: Characters with AP Drain gain 1 fewer AP each round.

berserk.name: STATUS_BERSERK_NAME
berserk.description_localised: Characters with Berserk can only use damaging moves.

bomb.name: STATUS_BOMB_NAME
bomb.description_localised: A character with Bomb will blow up at the end of their next turn if it’s not passed on by a melee attack.

booby_trapped.name: STATUS_NAME_BOOBY_TRAPPED
booby_trapped.description_localised: Characters with Booby Trapped have some of their moves replaced.

burned.name: STATUS_BURNED_NAME
burned.description_localised: Burned characters take damage at the end of their turn.

close_encounter.name: STATUS_CLOSE_ENCOUNTER_NAME
close_encounter.description_localised: Close Encounter reduces the range of a character’s ranged attacks, turning them into melee attacks.

coating_air.name: STATUS_COATING_AIR_NAME
coating_air.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

coating_astral.name: STATUS_COATING_ASTRAL_NAME
coating_astral.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

coating_beast.name: STATUS_COATING_BEAST_NAME
coating_beast.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

coating_fire.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

coating_glass.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

coating_poison.name: STATUS_COATING_POISON_NAME
coating_poison.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

coating_water.name: STATUS_COATING_WATER_NAME
coating_water.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

conductive.name: STATUS_CONDUCTIVE_NAME
conductive.description_localised: Conductive characters take damage whenever any Lightning-type attack is used.

confused.name: STATUS_CONFUSED_NAME
confused.description_localised: Confused characters may use the wrong move or target the wrong character.

contactdmg_air.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_air.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_astral.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_astral.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_beast.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_beast.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_earth.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_earth.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_fire.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_fire.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_glass.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_glass.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_glitter.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_glitter.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_ice.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_ice.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_lightning.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_lightning.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_metal.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_metal.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_plant.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_plant.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_plastic.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_plastic.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_poison.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_poison.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

contactdmg_water.name: STATUS_CONTACTDMG_NAME
contactdmg_water.description_localised: Characters with Contact Damage deal a bit of elemental damage whenever they land or receive a melee attack.

cottoned_on.name: STATUS_COTTONED_ON_NAME
cottoned_on.description_localised: For the next round, moves that target a character who has Cottoned On are guaranteed to miss.

deflated.name: STATUS_DEFLATED_NAME
deflated.description_localised: Deflated characters have significantly increased Evasion, but reduced Attack and Defence stats.

fair_fight.name: STATUS_FAIR_FIGHT_NAME
fair_fight.description_localised: While it is in effect, Fair Fight prevents new status effects from being applied.

flammable.name: STATUS_NAME_FLAMMABLE
flammable.description_localised: Flammable characters receive the Burned status whenever they are hit by Fire-type attacks. In addition, the damage received from Burned is increased.

flinch.name: STATUS_FLINCH_NAME
flinch.description_localised: A character that flinches skips its next turn.

fog.name: STATUS_FOG_NAME
fog.description_localised: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged attacks that aren’t Water, Air, or Ice-type to 0%.

gambit.name: STATUS_GAMBIT_NAME
gambit.description_localised: Characters with Gambit have massively increased stats, but are defeated when the timer on the Gambit status runs out.

ghostly.name: STATUS_GHOSTLY_NAME
ghostly.description_localised: Ghostly characters cannot be hit by attacks, but are defeated when the timer on the Ghostly status runs out.

glass_bonds.name: STATUS_GLASS_BONDS_NAME
glass_bonds.description_localised: Characters with Glass Bonds take damage each time they transform.

glass_shards.name: STATUS_GLASS_SHARDS_NAME
glass_shards.description_localised: While it is in effect, any characters that use a melee attack will take damage from the Glass Shards on the battlefield.

healing_leaf.name: STATUS_HEALING_LEAF_NAME
healing_leaf.description_localised: Characters with Healing Leaf regain some health at the start of each turn.

healing_steam.name: STATUS_HEALING_STEAM_NAME
healing_steam.description_localised: Characters with Healing Steam regain some health at the start of each turn.

hibernating.name: STATUS_HIBERNATING_NAME
hibernating.description_localised: Hibernating characters heal each turn that they’re asleep.

inflated.name: STATUS_INFLATED_NAME
inflated.description_localised: Inflated characters have increased Attack and Defence stats, but significantly reduced Evasion.

intercepting.name: STATUS_INTERCEPTING_NAME
intercepting.description_localised: Characters with Intercepting intercept all attacks directed at their allies.

leeched.name: STATUS_LEECHED_NAME
leeched.description_localised: Leeched characters take damage at the end of their turn. Opponents are healed by the amount of health taken off.

locked_on.name: STATUS_LOCKED_ON_NAME
locked_on.description_localised: Characters with Locked On cannot miss.

meditating.name: STATUS_MEDITATING_NAME
meditating.description_localised: Meditating characters raise their stats each turn that they’re asleep.

mind_meld.name: STATUS_MIND_MELD_NAME
mind_meld.description_localised: Characters with Mind-Meld share their moves with allies.

multistrike.name: STATUS_MULTISTRIKE_NAME
multistrike.description_localised: Characters with Multistrike will use each move twice if they have enough AP for it.

multitarget.name: STATUS_MULTITARGET_NAME
multitarget.description_localised: Attacks from characters with Multitarget target the whole team.

parry_stance.name: STATUS_PARRY_STANCE_NAME
parry_stance.description_localised: Characters with Parry Stance reflect damage from the next melee attack they receive back onto the attacker.

petrified.name: STATUS_PETRIFIED_NAME
petrified.description_localised: Petrified characters become Earth type and can only use Defend and Raise Shields.

poisoned.name: STATUS_POISONED_NAME
poisoned.description_localised: Poisoned characters take damage at the end of their turn.

resonance.name: STATUS_RESONANCE_NAME
resonance.description_localised: Each time Resonance is inflicted on a character it adds to a counter. When the counter reaches 3, the character is shaken apart and instantly defeated.

resurrected.name: STATUS_RESURRECTED_NAME
resurrected.description_localised: Resurrected characters can no longer be brought back by effects such as Ritual.

shrapnel.name: STATUS_SHRAPNEL_NAME
shrapnel.description_localised: Characters with Shrapnel take damage each time they transform.

sleep.name: STATUS_SLEEP_NAME
sleep.description_localised: Sleeping characters can’t use the moves they normally have.

snowed_in.name: STATUS_SNOWED_IN_NAME
snowed_in.description_localised: Snowed In characters are stuck in place and cannot use melee attacks.

spring_loaded.name: STATUS_SPRING_LOADED_NAME
spring_loaded.description_localised: Spring-Loaded extends the range of a character’s melee attacks, turning them into ranged attacks.

status_window.name: STATUS_WINDOW_NAME
status_window.description_localised: Walls owned by characters with the Window status no longer block ranged attacks.

stat_evasion_nullified.name: STATUS_STAT_EVASION_NULLIFIED_NAME
stat_evasion_nullified.description_localised: Characters inflicted with Evasion Nullified have their Evasion stat reduced to 1%.

summoned.name: STATUS_SUMMONED_NAME
summoned.description_localised: Summoned characters are called away from combat after a certain number of turns.

tape_jam.name: STATUS_TAPE_JAM_NAME
tape_jam.description_localised: Characters inflicted with Tape Jam are prevented from switching out their current tape until either Tape Jam is removed, or their tape breaks.

tower_defense.name: STATUS_TOWER_DEFENSE_NAME
tower_defense.description_localised: Characters with Tower Defence become Earth-type and have raised defence stats.

undying.name: STATUS_UNDYING_NAME
undying.description_localised: Characters with Ritual are brought back at 25% health when defeated.

unitarget.name: STATUS_UNITARGET_NAME
unitarget.description_localised: Attacks from characters with Unitarget that normally target a whole team only affect a single target, and attacks that are normally single-target have reduced accuracy.

wall_air.name: STATUS_WALL_NAME
wall_air.description_localised: Walls absorb a certain number of incoming hits. Type-advantaged attacks immediately break walls.

wall_gemstone.name: STATUS_GEMSTONE_WALL_NAME
wall_gemstone.description_localised: Walls absorb a certain number of incoming hits. Type-advantaged attacks immediately break walls. In addition to standard Wall behavior, Gemstone Wall provides its owner with 1 extra AP each turn.

wall_temptation.name: STATUS_TEMPTATION_WALL_NAME
wall_temptation.description_localised: Walls absorb a certain number of incoming hits. Type-advantaged attacks immediately break walls.
